over 1000 messages by the group this month and it is only the 19th.  Lots to read, lots to do, and then life gets in the way too.  I appreciate all posts, eventually read all posts, and learn from all.  Commenting is a matter of time, effort and feeling worthy...I try.  Ron L
Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:           How many hundreds of voices have I posted over the year and no 
comments. Either no one hears it, or..maybe just busy. 

Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> I posted a few good frank's box files yesterday and wrote two posts 
to 
> let everyone know they where there and not one comment.
> 
> Thanks guy's
> 
> Bruce
>

Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
